UPCOMING EVENTS

Artist Talk with Charlene Will

Join us on Saturday, January 31, 2-3:30 PM, for an artist talk by Charlene Will, recipient of the 2025 Pence Gallery Emerging Artist Award. The artist will give a walk-through of her work, covering her favorite locations to paint, how color and light inspires her, and the noticeable effects of climate on the natural world. This event is free for students and Pence Members ($10 at the door for non-Members).

Read More

Seconds Sale

Our Seconds Sale is back! Artists often decide to part with works that are experimental, have a small flaw, are older pieces, or duplicates, so that they can clear space and start new projects, sharing those works with the people in a seconds sale. Find unique works of art (such as ceramics, paintings, textile art, and more) from professional artists.

Read More

Art in Action

Our Art in Action family art workshops are every month! This is a drop-in program for ages 5-12 that engages kids in art projects that are fun, creative, and collaborative with their family members. On Sunday, January 25, come celebrate the Pences upcoming 50th birthday by making the perfect cake! Using polymer clay, liquid sculpey, and glaze, sculpt your own miniature cake and other delectable desserts.

Read More

Call For Artists

The Pence Gallery Emerging Artist Award 2026 is now open for applications via www.callforentry.org. This award supports the creation of new work by emerging artists in California and the opportunity to share that work through an exhibit and an artist talk. Emerging is defined as an artist early in their art career, who has limited experience exhibiting, but not an extensive solo exhibit history.

Read More

Call For Artists

The Pence opens up its second annual Member exhibit: Assorted Flavors, to celebrate the creativity and talent of our organizations members and supporters. Drop-off is March 6, 2026 and is limited to the first 40 entrants…

Read More

2nd Friday ArtAbout

The 2nd Friday ArtAbout is a wonderful celebration of new art exhibits, which are held at various locations throughout downtown Davis the evening of the 2nd Friday of every month. This free, monthly artwalk is a perfect activity to enjoy with family and friends!

Read More
